official_title: A bill relating to the retirement annuities of certain Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel who retired before July 12, 1974.

summary.text: Sets forth the formula for determining the retirement annuity for Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel who retired from service before July 12, 1974. States that such annuity shall be two and one-half percent of the average pay multiplied by total service not exceeding twenty years; plus two percent of the average pay multiplied by total service exceeding twenty years.
